name: Hidden Objects 3D
description:
Hidden Objects 3D

There are lots of hidden objects to be explored in this fantastic 3D game. The hidden objects 3D comes with lot of objects that we use in our daily life hidden in 3 scenes. The Garden, The Store Room, The Bed Room Scene make this game an ultimate challenge for treasure seekers.

You need to find the hidden objects and click on them to earn points. The clock ticks in every level and you get 90 seconds to finish the hunt.

Each scene has 10 levels and that makes 40 levels of awesome hunt for objects.

The 3D experience is unique and it really challenges you to find out the hidden objects.

Game Feature:

1.4 Scenes – The Garden, The store room, The Bed Room, The Office Room
2.10 levels in each scenes – Total 40 Awesome levels
3.Amazing 3D Graphics.
